revised_title: The Impact of Dredging Operations on the Tidal Regime of the River Mersey
tldr: The article discusses the impact of dredging operations on the tidal regime of the River Mersey, focusing on the improvements made to the approach to the port of Liverpool. The dredging operations have deepened the channel, allowing larger vessels to navigate the river more easily. The British Association for the Advancement of Science analyzed the tidal curves before and after the dredging to understand the changes in the tidal patterns and their effects on the river.
